component.name: RowListItems
component.script:
sub init() m.poster = m.top.findNode("poster") m.label = m.top.findNode("label")
' FIX: Manually set up the observer for the itemContent field m.top.observeField("itemContent", "itemContentChanged") end sub
sub itemContentChanged() if m.top.itemContent = invalid then return
if m.poster <> invalid and m.top.itemContent.HDPosterUrl <> invalid then m.poster.uri = m.top.itemContent.HDPosterUrl end if
' We will NOT show big names on tiles (images already have text) if m.label <> invalid then m.label.text = "" end if end sub
